siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Stan is trying to figure out what kind of headphones to buy. September is turning out to be expensive for him due to the tech toy purchases. In the mission to try and review milkshakes and weird menu items (like the impossible whopper.) Jon felt the need to order…

frontmatter.title: Cheez-It Pizza, Lawn Care Woes, Paper Planners and new Apple Things

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Stan and Jon reflect on the Super Bowl that Jon didn’t watch. Jon is happy that now everyone thinks that football is as boring as he thought for years. National Pizza day is Saturday February 9th. You’ll want to listen to this discussion to learn Stan’s secrets to…

frontmatter.title: Maybe Weezer Should have Performed  the Super Bowl Halftime Show
